quote: I will take responsibility for what I have done, If I must fall, I will rise each time a better man.
Start early.
A person is more than their experiences, stocked up like stones... Our best moments are the foudations we use to reach for the sky.
Expectations are like fine pottery. The harder you hold them, the more likely they are to break.
attribution: Shallan Davar, The Way Of Kings

quote: We aren't limited to one way of being great.
He who would climb the ladder must begin at the bottom.
Talent is something you make bloom, instinct is something you polish.
Do you need a reason to not want to lose?
વળગણ કામ નું નહિ, કાર્ય નું રાખો.
Life before Death, Strength before Weakness, Journey before Destination.
The only thing we are allowed to do is to believe that we won't regret the choices we made.
You don't rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.
Purpose defeats pain. Purposelessness induces it.
Give yourself time to unwind. The best ideas come when you are taking a shit!
No matter what the struggle, no matter the cost, if you choose it, it becomes beginning of the story of how you overcame it.
A man is not great because he hasn't failed; a man is great because failure hasn't stopped him.
પ્રાર્થના થી પરિસ્થિતિ નથી બદલાતી. અભિગમ બદલાય છે. અને બદલાયેલો અભિગમ, સમગ્ર જીવન ને બદલી નાખે છે.
What is the most important step a man can take? It's always the next step.
It's not about what you do; it's about how much you love doing it.
The sky is not my limit.. I am.
Some lessons have to be experienced before they can be understood.
The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
